representation_information.name: Material Exchange Format (MXF) -- MXF Generic Container
representation_information.description: The native essence container for the MXF file format that carries video, audio, metadata and other 'payloads,' i.e., bitstreams called essences in the audio-visual community. The container is described as 'streamable,' meaning that its audio-visual content can be 'continuously decoded through mechanisms such as interleaving essence components with stream-based metadata.'

relation.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections
